name: All Clowns in the toca circus - Free app for children
name_original: All Clowns in the toca circus - Free app for children
description:
This great puzzle app offers fantastic worlds, lovely illustrations, amazing effects and sounds...and it’s waiting to be discovered now!

It will keep your child playing for a long fun time. Everywhere there are new things to discover. All completely designed appropriate for children.

Our promise: Each product will work with parents and young children - just because they are developed and tested together with them. All suggestions during development affect our work directly. As a result, we are able to provide you with the best apps for kids! Try yourself – for free!

You know it: puzzles, books, games – usually they cost a lot of money – but often end up in the corner soon. Our apps stay more interesting. They focus on the most important steps of learning: touching, hearing, seeing and reacting. And it’s even fun for their parents watching and being able to join in.
